message: Hi Bob, I have a product that I believe would be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $13000.  Let me know what you think!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $12000 for it.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your position. I'm willing to come down to $12500.  This price still reflects the significant value this product brings, and it gives us both a good deal.  What do you think?
